SELECT P.MEDIUMCATE, P.PRODUCTIMG, P.PRODUCTNO, P.PRODUCTSTATUS, P.PRODUCTNAME, P.PRICE, M.MCNAME, M.LARGECATE FROM PRODUCT P, MEDIUMCATE M WHERE P.MEDIUMCATE=M.MEDIUMCATE AND P.MEDIUMCATE=TO_NUMBER(#{category})
